phrs.translation: 旅游胜地；旅游目的地；旅游景点

sentences.sentence: Our luggage was checked all the way through to our final destination.
sentences.translation: 我们的行李一直被托运到最终目的地。

sentences.sentence: At last, after twenty hours on the boat, they arrived at their destination.
sentences.translation: 乘船二十小时之后，他们终于到达了目的地。

sentences.sentence: He gets you to your destination without turning the trip into a white-knuckle experience.
sentences.translation: 他会将你安然无恙地送达你的目的地。
